content.rendered:
Red Rose Brown Rice is a great option for a tasty and healthy rice dish. The Red Rose Brown Basmati rice has the full bran intact. Bran is the nutritious covering of rice which is abundant in fiber, vitamins, and minerals. It has natural earthy and nutty flavors which add an amazing aroma and deliciousness to any rice dish.
Every grain of Red Rose Brown rice is long and adds a great texture to any rice meal. Enriched with high fiber making it a superfood and a great healthy lifestyle choice for every family.
Grown & harvested in the foothills of the Himalayas in the Indian subcontinent, this rice is full of essential vitamins & nutrients that will make your meal healthy along with a delectable taste. Organically matured for at least two years for better quantity, fluffiness & yield. The aging process also delivers the unique Basmati aroma & taste to the rice.
All Sona Cereal products are produced following international quality standards, cleaned, sorted & packed in supreme, hygienic & state-of-the-art facilities, without coming in contact with the human touch.

  • Rich in fiber
  • Cholestrol & gluten free
  • High nutritional value aiding in an active lifestyle
  • Low in glycemic index for proper digestion
  • Long grains & fine texture
